ing: 1 (19 ounce) package Bob EvansÂ® Italian Sausage, cut into bite-sized pieces
3 (14 ounce) cans reduced sodium chicken broth
des: "Savory and delicious, this 4 ingredient soup could not be easier to stir up! Enjoy this warm tortellini soup with a green salad and Italian bread."
ins: In large saucepan over medium heat, brown sausage. Add tortellini, chicken broth and green beans. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, and simmer 10 to 12 minutes or until pasta is tender and sausage is cooked through.
